body.name: Vtopmart Airtight Food Storage Containers with Lids, 24 pcs Plastic Kitchen and Pantry Organization Canisters for Cereal, Dry Food, Flour and Sugar, BPA Free, Includes 24 Labels
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 50 mins
features: Help Organize Your Kitchen and Pantry— Imagine every time walking to your kitchen or pantry, found everything is neatly organized. No longer messy, you can get everything you want very quickly. With the stackable and space-saving design, these containers will make more efficient use of every inch of your kitchen pantry cabinets.

4 Size Combinations Fit Your Needs — Our kitchen storage container set comes in 4 different sizes. Includes 6 Tall Container (2.5quart/2.8 liters), 6 Large Containers (1.8quart/2.0 liters), 6 Medium Containers (1.5quart/1.6 liters), 6 Small Containers (0.7quart/0.8 liters). Perfect for storing spaghetti, baking supplies, cereal, flour, sugar, oats, pasta, rice, coffee, tea, snacks, nuts and other dry goods.

Airtight Containers Keep Food Fresh — The side-locking lids with silicone gasket make these storage containers airtight, and the top flips open easily. The airtight storage system will always keep your food dry and fresh. All have the same lids make it easy to wash dry and reuse with ease.

BPA Free and Food Grade Material — Vtopmart pantry storage containers are made of durable plastic, BPA free, which have a longer life than many other brands plastic containers. Clear containers make it convenient to see what’s inside, you can easily get what you want without opening every container.

24 Reusable Labels — Except 24pcs dry food storage containers, you will also receive 24pcs labels. They are reusable, you can switch contents whenever you need. Just wipe clean with a damp cloth to change what you have written, Peel and Re-stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best storage containers ever!
reviews.reviewText: I'd purchased these for three of my children before who needed storage in their kitchens, and they loved them. So when my husband and I bought our RV and I had to be very practical with my storage spaces, I turned to these. They're perfect in my pantry! They are stackable, hold everything safely and securely, and are spill-proof, which you know is imperative if you've ever traveled in an RV! I love how they can stack easily, how they have enough different sizes that I can fit anything I want in them, how they clean easily, and the washable labels come in handy when I rearrange things in the containers. I keep buying more because I find so many uses for them. They're very well made, open and close easily yet securely, and best of all, they don't hold odors so I can store dried fruit in them one time and then switch to rice another and the smells don't transfer to the different foods. I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd Buy Them Again
reviews.reviewText: This seems to be a very good set of containers. They wash up well. The lids fit all of the containers, so I don't have to sort through to find a match. The labels arrived a little bent, but they straightened out just fine once on the containers. The containers are clear, which makes it easy to see when I need more of each product at a glance. My only challenge with these is that I wished to have a little more say in which sizes I took home. I would have liked an option to add in two of the bigger ones, etc. But this set does well. I have a separate set for larger bags of flour, sugar, rice, and quinoa. I also would have liked to see some clear measuring cups included in this set, as it would be nice to scoop from certain containers.I don't love that the tapered shape of the containers means there's wasted space in the gaps between the containers, but it is very nice to have everything stack together so neatly - and I think this is industry standard, so I cannot complain about this too much.My final fuss was that it felt like the lids didn't easily seat. I felt like I had to snap the side pieces to make them really settle. I would have liked to have them settle in a little easier. But it wasn't like I had wrestle them on. It just didn't settle in the way I was expecting. It seems to have sealed just fine. My pantry looks much neater than it did before.Overall, I'm quite pleased with these containers. They seem to do a very good job of holding a variety of pantry items. They fit well together and the universal lids are a great feature. They're solid, good quality containers. I'd buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Airtight locking lids that work!
reviews.reviewText: These lids lock down tight! The 24 pack has a great array of sizes to fit my cabinets. Save yourself some time and after you unwrap them from the packaging, do NOT stack them inside each other. They will suction and become so friggin hard to get back out. Once the lids are on they are very stackable, if you have the right cabinet space. Very pleased with this purchase, I was blown away at the quality and amount you get for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value. Perfect for organizing pantry
reviews.reviewText: This is my third time ordering this set. I've used them to organize my pantry as well as to help organize my mother's pantry in Florida and reduce issues with insects. Durable, easy to wash & use. Love the chalkboard labels. I prefer to use my own white gel pens rather than white marker that's included because it's too light to read easily. If there was a better pen, I'd give this 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Vtopmart Airtight Food Storage Containers with Lids are a game-changer when it comes to kitchen organization. With 24 pieces included in the set, these containers offer ample storage space for a variety of dry foods such as cereal, flour, sugar, and more.One of the standout features of these containers is their airtight seal, which helps to keep your food fresh for longer periods. The lids fit snugly onto the containers, preventing any moisture or air from entering and causing spoilage. This is especially important for maintaining the quality and taste of your pantry staples.The BPA-free plastic construction of these containers ensures that they are safe to use for storing food. You can have peace of mind knowing that no harmful chemicals will leach into your food. Additionally, the clear design of the containers makes it easy to identify the contents at a glance, saving you time and effort in the kitchen.Another great feature of these containers is the inclusion of 24 labels. These labels allow you to easily label and organize your pantry items, making it convenient to find what you need when you need it. The containers are stackable as well, maximizing storage space in your pantry or kitchen cabinets.Overall, the Vtopmart Airtight Food Storage Containers with Lids are a fantastic investment for anyone looking to declutter and organize their kitchen. The airtight seal, BPA-free material, and included labels make these containers a must-have for any home. Say goodbye to messy and disorganized pantries, and hello to a more efficient and enjoyable cooking experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and versatile storage
reviews.reviewText: I have bought this product three times. Have been so happy with them and they are my go to storage for pantry, dry goods, and snacks. They work well for coffee and brown sugar and seal well so the brown sugar doesn’t get hard. The variety of sizes is great and provides you with all the sizes you need. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought these as I’m in the middle of a kitchen remodel and there's dust everywhere. I have a shelving unit in the living room that has lots of bags of flour, sugar, oats etc…. So, now they are easier to find now they are in the containers and look a lot tidier. The plastic is sturdy and the lids have a good seal on the and are easy to clip into place. Great product for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cabinet organization and food storage
reviews.reviewText: Great containers for cabinet organization and food storage! Be aware that the lids aren't one size fits all, but other than that- no issues.

I love these containers. They are the best. I bought three boxes of 24 containers. They hold screws and nails, like a charm, and screwdrivers too. They are air tight, with snap-top lids, and they are made with a crack-resistant plastic, of decent quality. Perfect for food storage, as well 🙂. I would definately purchase this product again. It's a Great buy

Os produtos são de ótima qualidade, os potes são bem transparentes e mais transparentes do que isso só vidro.São fortes e resistentes e superou as minhas espectativas.Está bem fácil de retirar porque todos os potes são envolvidos em sacos plásticos , faz com que deslize com mais facilidades.Chegou bem embalado e veio tudo direitinho sem faltar nada.A entrega foi rápida como sempre é a competência da Amazon.E estou muito satisfeita e vou comprar novamente.Eu Recomendo esse produto porque é excelente.
por fin pude tener mi despensa ordenada y bonita, son de excelente calidad.
Purchased for my pantry. Love the variety of sizes. Comes with the labels and marker. They seal up tight and are made very well. They stack nicely on my shelf. Happy with my purchase.
Produto muito bom, qualidade muito boa do produto.
